question: 車掌
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>car</kanji> <kanji>manipulat</kanji>or is someone who manipulates the car. This <ja>車</ja> riffs off of <ja>電車</ja>, which is a train, making the train manipulator a <vocabulary>train conductor</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
